title._content: [Two unidentified soldiers in Confederate uniforms, one with flintlock pistol] (LOC)

description._content: [Two unidentified soldiers in Confederate uniforms, one with flintlock pistol] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : quarter-plate tintype ; 11.8 x 9.4 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Leather; curved octagon and scroll design. Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2012; (2010:105-5) Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Forms part of: Ambrotype/Tintype photograph filing series (Library of Congress). Published in: Confederate faces : a pictorial review of the individuals in the Confederate armed forces / William A. Albaugh. Wilmington, N.C. : Broadfoot, 1993, front cover and p. 22. Subjects: Confederate States of America.--Army--People--1860-1870. Soldiers--Confederate--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Confederate--1860-1870. Handguns--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Confederate. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Tintypes--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.32475 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2830
